public Result Objectmysql_xdevapi\Collection::replaceOne stringid stringdoc
Updates (or replaces) the document identified by id with the provided one, if it exists. This operation does
not required to call the 'execute' function.

&reftitle.parameters;
id
This is the ID of the documents that have to be replaced or update.
doc
This is the document that will be used to update or replace the document pointed by the ID from the first
argument.
The document can be either a document object or a valid JSON string describing a new document.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
The returned object can be used to verify how many documents as been affected.
